sect2.title: iNegate
sect2.para: - is the parser recognized symbol for this operator. This is a unary operator that returns the negative equivalent (additive inverse) of a given positive value. It has the same effect as taking a positive number and multiplying it by negative one, except for the fact that this operator has a higher precedence than the multiplicative operators.

example.title: Example
